definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: It uses people's instinct and ignorant of science to try to blemish Soya Bean Salad Oil.
sentences.chinese: 是在利用人們的直覺和世俗感覺來抹黑大豆色拉油。

sentences.english: Shrimp salad is our specialty too.
sentences.chinese: 蝦仁色拉油也是我們的特色菜。

sentences.english: The method of microcapsule was used to make the soybean oil powder in this research.
sentences.chinese: 對大豆色拉油採用微膠囊化的方法制取大豆粉末油脂。

sentences.english: Preparation of diglyceride by lipase-catalyzed glycerolysis of soybean salad oil with glycerol in a batch stirred tank reactor was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了脂肪酶催化大豆色拉油甘油解制備二甘酯過程。

sentences.english: There is a salad of grate carrot and French dress .
sentences.chinese: 曾有過胡蘿蔔絲加法式色拉油做的色拉。

sentences.english: To make the salad, you should add some salad oil.
sentences.chinese: 拌制這種色拉時應該加入一些色拉油。

definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
